document.full_text: commodities trader glencore will close the books for its planned $11 billion initial public offering a day ahead of schedule, underscoring strong investor demand for its shares despite volatile commodity markets.
document.title: glencore to close books early on $11 billion ipo
lines_and_colors: commodities trader glencore will close the books for its planned $11 billion initial public offering a day ahead of schedule, underscoring strong investor demand for its shares despite volatile commodity markets.
